title: The Game Streaming Wars Are Heating Up! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.12.20
description:
Listen to The Besties free, only on Spotify.

Hurry to http://upstart.com/kfgames to find out HOW LOW your Upstart rate is.

To get your new wireless plan for just 15 bucks a month, and get the plan shipped to your door for FREE, go to http://mintmobile.com/games.

It's Whitta Wednesday! Gary joins Blessing to talk about a Microsoft and Samsung partnership along with some bad news for GeForce Nvidia Now.

Time Stamps - 
00:07:35 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: James Davis, Frankfurter, Drew Gardiner, Katie Gallacher, David Meintel, Shiraz Razak, Dominic Shorter, Mohammed Mohammed, Patrick Higgins, Ginny Berndt, The Nano Biologist, Travis Austin Guy-kow-ski, Joseph Soler
The Roper Report   -
00:09:00 - Microsoft and Samsung partner on Xbox cloud-based game streaming, I’m pulling this from Tom Warren at The Verge
00:23:50 - Geoff Keighley isn't producing E3 Coliseum this year, this comes directly from Geoff's Twitter
00:27:02 - How dead is E3 this year? - Best Friends Q:Borzen00
00:36:50 - Nvidia’s GeForce Now is losing all Activision Blizzard games, a bad sign for cloud gaming, this is by Sean Hollister of The Verge
00:41:00 - Does Activision Blizzard plan to launch their own service for cloud based gaming or are they wanting an exclusivity deal? - Best Friends Q: Frankfurtter
00:47:14 - EA will move Need for Speed development back to Criterion, this comes from Christopher Dring of Gamesindustry.biz
00:56:25 - Quick hits:
00:58:57 -  UPSTART
01:00:15 -  MINT MOBILE
01:01:25 -  SPOTIFY: THE BESTIES
01:03:10 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
01:05:25 - please react to the new “Feel the Power of PlayStation” ad - Mitchell from Canada
01:07:58 - WHAT IS GOING ON WITH NINTENDO? - Travis Hrubeniuk
01:12:15 - Squad Up: Tommyboy(CoD) Tommyboy601
01:13:25 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Tim
